sourceMeaningMnemonic: So my <radical>building</radical> has a big <radical>splinter</radical>, right in the <kanji>corner</kanji>. So what?
meaningInfo: Imagine a huge splinter coming out of the corner of the building. It's in a really dangerous spot, but the owner doesn't seem so worried about it.
readingMnemonic: That <kanji>corner</kanji> is dangerous, but what are you going to do, <reading>sue me</reading> (<ja>すみ</ja>)?
readingInfo: Actually, please don't sue me. I'll fix the splinter coming out of the corner of my building.
